General.Name: KWANGJIN WINTEC CO. Ltd
General.Description: iWIN CO.,LTD engages in the manufacturing and selling of automobile seat heaters in South Korea, rest of Asia, the United States, and Europe. It offers heating handles and ventilation seats, as well as seat heater parts. The company was formerly known as Kwangjin Wintec Co., Ltd. and changed its name to iWIN CO.,LTD in January 2022. iWIN CO.,LTD was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
